Title: Network Messenger
Description:
Network Messenger is a LAN messaging and chat program which allows messages to be sent between users on a network peer-to-peer with no need for a server.
It is developed in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Network Messenger is a LAN messaging and chat program which allows messages to be sent between users on a network peer-to-peer with no need for a server.
It is developed in C#.


Features
  • Addressing to User@Computer and user@ip-address (e.g. user: john on computer: johnsdesktop, address: john@johnsdesktop)
    • Planned Feature of User Discovery see Release 3.0
  • Support for individual messages
    • Direct Reply to Messages
  • Support for 2 user chats
  • Aero Glass Background on Windows Vista with Aero Enabled
  • Spellchecking

Requirements
  • .NET Framework 3.0

For Help using this program see Help

Version 3.0 preview coming soon (see Release 3.0)
